What we Do

We help candidates to get dream jobs without a single penny

As a recruitment firm, we help candidates to secure their dream jobs without a single penny. We support job seekers throughout their career journey while assisting companies by providing qualified, relevant talent—ensuring their teams are filled with quality professionals who contribute to long-term success and organizational growth.

We partner with clients through Recruitment Process Outsourcing, streamlining hiring with expert support, reduced costs, and improved talent acquisition efficiency.

Success stories

Hear from our clients​

Rated 4.5 on 

Dear NLEY Consultants, We appreciate your dedication in filling our crucial hiring needs on time. Your team consistently delivers quality candidates with a deep understanding of our requirements. Thank you for helping us close several key positions under tight timelines. Your speed, precision, and professionalism made a real difference. We truly value our partnership.

HR Manager - BFSI Industry

Dear Team, We’re thankful for your responsiveness and ability to deliver results under pressure. We truly appreciate your consistent efforts in providing skilled candidates who are a great fit for our organization. Your expertise is a key asset to us.Your commitment to our success is clear, and we look forward to future collaboration.

Hiring Manager - Contact Center

Dear NLEY Team, Thank you for being a trusted hiring partner. Your support during our peak hiring season was timely, strategic, and impactful. We’re grateful for your efforts. Your ability to match the right talent with the right roles has made a real difference. Thank you for your ongoing commitment and recruitment excellence.

Talent Aquisition - Hiring Manager (Corporate)
Blogs

Latest From NLEY

What Is Human Resource Management?

Human Resource Management (HRM) is more than just a department that handles payroll and recruitment, HRM is the strategic core of any organization. Whether you’re a small start‑up or a large corporation, understanding what HRM is and why it matters can help you build a strong workforce and a sustainable business. In this article we unpack the definition of HRM, explain its roles and explore why it’s indispensable to organizational success. By the end, you’ll know how HRM functions can support your business and how NLEY can be your partner in building a people‑first culture.

Your Ultimate Guide to Finding the Right Candidates

Hiring is hard and hiring the right candidate? Even harder. Whether you’re a startup founder or part of an HR team, you’ve likely faced this challenge: plenty of applications, but no one who truly fits the role. In today’s fast-paced hiring environment, companies can’t afford to guess or hope for the best. This blog is your step-by-step guide to finding the right candidates; faster, smarter, and with less stress.

Top 10 Hiring Mistakes HR Teams Should Avoid

Hiring the right candidate isn’t easy, and in today’s fast-moving job market, even a small mistake in your hiring process can lead to lost time, wasted money, or the wrong fit joining your team. Whether you’re an HR manager, a founder doing hiring on the side, or part of a recruitment team, this guide will help you avoid the most common hiring mistakes and build a smoother, faster, and smarter process.
